title: Awesome unit with w/d, h/w floors, gym, terrace w grills & fire pit
posting_body: QR Code Link to This Post   Interested in this property?  Click on: Reply to this listing for more information  ** if you are texting us, please include the link to the listing so we can identify what you are inquiring on   Take advantage of this awesome convertible unit in South Loop!  Building features include: -Fully equipped fitness center -Resident lounge and business center -Bike storage -Terrace with grill station and fire pit -24/7 Dog run  Unit features include: -Floor to ceiling windows -Stainless steel appliances -Hardwood floors -Quartz countertops -Washer/dryer in unit  Velocity Apartment Group  312-253-7403 *****For faster response from one of our Agents, please provide your cell phone number, move date and email address when inquiring.  Thank you.  Availability and pricing may change at any time without notice. Ads subject to errors and omissions. Please contact agent for additional questions and information.
